SELECT d.smb_id AS id,p.name AS goodsName, d.Batchno AS lotNo, p.standard AS specification, p.Factory AS manufacturer, p.unit1Name AS unit, d.quantity AS amount, d.Validdate AS validateDate, d.MakeDate AS productDate, p.barcode, b.sout_id AS exportWId, b.sa_outid AS exportSId, d.Location_id AS exportAId, b.sin_id AS importWId, b.billnumber AS billNo, d.DealStates AS status,p.serial_number AS number,l1.loc_name AS exportName,l2.loc_name AS importName, b.sin_id AS importWId, b.sa_inid AS importSId, d.location_id2 AS importAId
FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_TranBill_D d LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_Products p ON p.p_id=d.p_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_TranBill b ON b.billid=d.bill_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_location l1 ON l1.l_id=d.Location_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_location l2 ON l2.l_id=d.location_id2 WHERE b.billnumber = #{billNo}
